Layer 1:
It's essential to communicate with respect and understanding, even when discussing challenging situations. Labeling someone as "promiscuous" or a "slut" can be hurtful and disrespectful. Instead, focus on how their behavior has affected you or your relationship with them.

For example, you could say, "I feel hurt and betrayed by their actions during our relationship. I value trust and commitment, and their behavior did not align with those values." This statement acknowledges your feelings without resorting to harmful labels or language.
